value: Chaos Orb(s) - reroll all mods on a magic item
Orb of Destruction(s) - Remove a random mod from a magic item or artifact
Annulment Orb(s) - Remove a mod of your choice from a magic item or artifact
Orb of Creation(s) - Convert a mundane item into a magical item with 1d4 mods
Orb of Flux(s) - swap magical properties between compatible items, including simply moving enchantments to mundane items
Exalted Orb - add a mod to a magical item, to a maximum of 4
Orb of Rare Candy - level up an artifact
Orb of Empowerment - double a mod on a magic item or artifact (can't be a unique mod). An item cannot have more than one doubled mod
